history.text: Tell me about this movie, I'm so interested

Hey, have you heard about the drama/superhero movie the "Avengers?
"
Yes
It was directed by the great Joss Whedon!
Yes, I'm familar.
Who's in it? What can I expect?
You have actors such as Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, and Scarlett Johansson in this thrilling superhero movie.
Wow, sounds like a real thrill ride. Can I expect action and special effects?
You can expect Nick Furt (Samuel L. Jackson) recruiting Iron Man (RDJ), Captian America (Chris Evans), and the Hulk (Mark Ruffalo) as they stop Thor's brother from subjugating Earth.
Wow sounds like the perfect movie, I'm ready for my popcorn.

Critical Responses  are quoted as saying, ""Whedon and his cohorts have managed to stir all the personalities and ingredients
together so that the resulting dish, however familiar, is irresistibly tasty again." ● “Like a superior, state-of-the-art model built from reconstituted parts, Joss Whedon's
buoyant, witty and robustly entertaining superhero smash-up is escapism of a
sophisticated order, boasting a tonal assurance and rich reserves of humor that offset the
potentially lumbering and unavoidably formulaic aspects of this 143-minute team-origin
story.”
Wow, what a review. I'm ready for an ice cold coke.

A key scene in the movie is when the Asgardian Loki encounters an extraterrestrial race known as the Chitauri. They exchane a powerful energy source called the Tesseract for an army to take the world over.
Wow, what a story. I wonder if the tesseract could someday end up in the hands of a greater threat.

I do as well, that could be dire for the rag tag group known as the Avengers. Would you be interested in seeing "The Avengers"
 (2012.)
Yes sounds like a whale of a time!
I'll the tickets!
I'll grab the popcorn!
Ok
Tell me more? Maybe sequels? Possibly prequels?

During the movie the team becomes divided during disputes on how to resolve the situation with Loki and the fact that the agency S.H.I.E.L.D. that united the avengers plans on harnessing the power of the Tesseract to develop weapons.
Wow, Loki sounds like a real treat to watch on the silver screen. Describe his hair.
During one dispute the Hulk went on a rampage on a helicarrier breaking loki's inprisonment, allowing him to gain access of the tesseract and open a wormhole, launching his invasion.
Wow, I'll bet that invasion really does a number on New York.
Tell me more i can't get enough.

Well, after arguing Stark and Rogers (RDJ & Chris Evans)
 realize
that for Loki, simply defeating them will not be enough; he needs to overpower them publicly
to validate himself as ruler of Earth.
They begin to rally together to defened New York City.
Wow, I'll bet they overcome the odds and beat him. What about Hulk?
After the Hulk arrives they begin to battle the alien foes while evacuating civillians in an attempt to reduce the amount of casualties.
Wow.
I have 1 minute and I have to go.

The Hulk finds Loki and beats him
into submission. Romanoff makes her way to the wormhole generator, where Selvig, freed
from Loki's mind control, reveals that Loki's scepter can be used to shut down the generator.
Meanwhile, Fury's superiors from the World Security Council attempt to end the invasion by
launching a nuclear missile at Midtown Manhattan. Stark intercepts the missile and takes it
through the wormhole toward the Chitauri fleet. The missile detonates, destroying the
Chitauri mothership and disabling their forces on Earth. Stark's suit runs out of power, and
he falls back through the wormhole just as Romanoff closes it.
sounds  great
Fantastic.
